message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product but I can only go up to $90 at this time.
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for 105. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still a bit higher than where I can go right now. I'm willing to pay $95 for it. Let me know what you think.
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob! I can offer you the product for 98. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really like the product.
Alice, that's getting very close to my limit.  How about $96? It's a good deal for both of us.
I'm almost there, Bob! I can offer you the product for 99. It's my final offer, and I think it's a great deal for both of us.
